DOC.brief_title: Cancer Center Trials : Reasons Low Accrual Rates One Academic Institution Vs . The Community Setting
DOC.detailed_description: Objective 1 : All new cancer patient see four month period University New Mexico Cancer Research Treatment Center ( UNM CRTC ) ( academic population ) six month-period New Mexico Cancer Care Alliance ( NMCCA ) ( community set ) . A careful screening log keep period research nurse cooperation document 1 ) whether patient see accrued clinical trial , 2 ) available trial patient might possibly eligible , 3 ) reason register clinical trial . Objective 2 : To compare response question entry form woman eligible decline participation participate Hispanic versus non-Hispanic ethnicity , access , copy , analyze risk assessment profile otherwise know entry eligibility form complete woman consider participate study Tamoxifen Raloxifene ( STAR ) . Patterns eligibility criterion risk assessment describe ethnicity woman consider entry chemopreventive randomize trial without use personal identifying data accordance Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act 1996 maintain patient confidentiality
